Modding:Lua Event/OnChallengeQuery.name: OnChallengeQuery
Modding:Lua Event/OnChallengeQuery.description: Called when the challenge options get populated.

Modding:Lua Event/OnTickEvenPaused.name: OnTickEvenPaused
Modding:Lua Event/OnTickEvenPaused.description: Same as OnTick, but triggered when the game is paused as well.

Modding:Lua Event/OnAIStateExit.name: OnAIStateExit
Modding:Lua Event/OnAIStateExit.description: Triggered when an AI state is exited.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character the state was executed on.

Modding:Lua Event/OnConnectFailed.name: OnConnectFailed
Modding:Lua Event/OnConnectFailed.description: Triggered when connection to server has failed.

Modding:Lua Event/OnPreMapLoad.name: OnPreMapLoad
Modding:Lua Event/OnPreMapLoad.description: Triggered before a map is loaded.

Modding:Lua Event/OnEquipSecondary.name: OnEquipSecondary
Modding:Lua Event/OnEquipSecondary.description: Triggered when a character equips an item in its secondary slot.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character which equipped the item.

Modding:Lua Event/OnNewGame.name: OnNewGame
Modding:Lua Event/OnNewGame.description: Triggered after a world is initialized.

parameters.name: square
parameters.description: The square where the player is located.

Modding:Lua Event/OnTick.name: OnTick
Modding:Lua Event/OnTick.description: Called every tick, try to not use this one, use EveryTenMinutes instead because it can create a lot of frame loss/garbage collection.

Modding:Lua Event/OnInitWorld.name: OnInitWorld
Modding:Lua Event/OnInitWorld.description: Triggered during the process of initializing the world.

Modding:Lua Event/OnDisconnect.name: OnDisconnect
Modding:Lua Event/OnDisconnect.description: Triggered when player disconnects from server.

Modding:Lua Event/OnEnterVehicle.name: OnEnterVehicle
Modding:Lua Event/OnEnterVehicle.description: Called when [[IsoPlayer]] successfully enters a vehicle.

Modding:Lua Event/OnLoadSoundBanks.name: OnLoadSoundBanks
Modding:Lua Event/OnLoadSoundBanks.description: Triggered when sound banks are loaded for the game.

Modding:Lua Event/OnPlayerMove.name: OnPlayerMove
Modding:Lua Event/OnPlayerMove.description: Triggered while the player is moving.

Modding:Lua Event/OnRightMouseDown.name: OnRightMouseDown
Modding:Lua Event/OnRightMouseDown.description: Triggered when right mouse button is down.

Modding:Lua Event/OnPreFillInventoryObje.name: OnPreFillInventoryObjectContextMenu
Modding:Lua Event/OnPreFillInventoryObje.description: Called before context menus get filled with options.

Modding:Lua Event/OnFillWorldObjectConte.name: OnFillWorldObjectContextMenu
Modding:Lua Event/OnFillWorldObjectConte.description: Called when world object context menus are filed.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player who will see the menu.

parameters.name: boolean
parameters.description: True if called for the purpose of testing for nearby objects.

Modding:Lua Event/OnPostMapLoad.name: OnPostMapLoad
Modding:Lua Event/OnPostMapLoad.description: Triggered after a cell is loaded.

Modding:Lua Event/OnCreateSurvivor.name: OnCreateSurvivor
Modding:Lua Event/OnCreateSurvivor.description: Triggered when a survivor is created.

Modding:Lua Event/OnPostUIDraw.name: OnPostUIDraw
Modding:Lua Event/OnPostUIDraw.description: Called by UI Manager in its render function after the UI has been drawn.

Modding:Lua Event/OnObjectLeftMouseButto.name: OnObjectLeftMouseButtonDown
Modding:Lua Event/OnObjectLeftMouseButto.description: Triggered when left mouse button clicked on [[IsoObject]]

Modding:Lua Event/OnCreatePlayer.name: OnCreatePlayer
Modding:Lua Event/OnCreatePlayer.description: Triggered when a player is created.

Modding:Lua Event/OnMainMenuEnter.name: OnMainMenuEnter
Modding:Lua Event/OnMainMenuEnter.description: Called when player sees the main menu. This will occur when they launch the game or if they quit a running game.

Modding:Lua Event/OnObjectRightMouseButt.name: OnObjectRightMouseButtonDown
Modding:Lua Event/OnObjectRightMouseButt.description: Triggered when right mouse button clicked on [[IsoObject]]

Modding:Lua Event/OnScoreboardUpdate.name: OnScoreboardUpdate
Modding:Lua Event/OnScoreboardUpdate.description: Called when multiplayer scoreboard is updated.

Modding:Lua Event/OnCharacterCreateStats.name: OnCharacterCreateStats
Modding:Lua Event/OnCharacterCreateStats.description: Triggered when a characters stats are created.

Modding:Lua Event/OnAIStateExecute.name: OnAIStateExecute
Modding:Lua Event/OnAIStateExecute.description: Triggered when an AI state executes.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character the state executed on.

Modding:Lua Event/OnRefreshInventoryWind.name: OnRefreshInventoryWindowContainers
Modding:Lua Event/OnRefreshInventoryWind.description: Triggered during the process of refreshing inventory containers.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: A string representing the state of the refresh process; can be any of "begin", "beforeFloor", "buttonsAdded", and "end".

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: denoted key. (See Keyboard Class in java docs for more info.)

Modding:Lua Event/OnClothingUpdated.name: OnClothingUpdated
Modding:Lua Event/OnClothingUpdated.description: Triggered when a character's clothing items are updated.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character whose clothing was updated.

Modding:Lua Event/OnCreateLivingCharacte.name: OnCreateLivingCharacter
Modding:Lua Event/OnCreateLivingCharacte.description: Called when IsoPlayer or IsoSurvivor is being created.

parameters.name: player_or_survivor
parameters.description: The player or survivor being created.

parameters.name: survivorDesc
parameters.description: The description of the player or survivor being created.

Modding:Lua Event/OnPostFloorLayerDraw.name: OnPostFloorLayerDraw
Modding:Lua Event/OnPostFloorLayerDraw.description: Triggered after a floor layer is rendered.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: The Z-index of the layer which was rendered.

Modding:Lua Event/OnGameStart.name: OnGameStart
Modding:Lua Event/OnGameStart.description: Called when a new game is started, or loading of a save is finished.

Modding:Lua Event/OnObjectLeftMouseButto.name: OnObjectLeftMouseButtonUp
Modding:Lua Event/OnObjectLeftMouseButto.description: Triggered when left mouse button is released on [[IsoObject]]

Modding:Lua Event/OnRightMouseUp.name: OnRightMouseUp
Modding:Lua Event/OnRightMouseUp.description: Triggered when mouse button is released.

Modding:Lua Event/OnWeaponSwingHitPoint.name: OnWeaponSwingHitPoint
Modding:Lua Event/OnWeaponSwingHitPoint.description: Triggered when a [[HandWeapon]] has hit the apex of its swing.

Modding:Lua Event/LevelPerk.name: LevelPerk
Modding:Lua Event/LevelPerk.description: Triggered when a perk is leveled up.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character whose perk is being leveled up.

Modding:Lua Event/EveryHours.name: EveryHours
Modding:Lua Event/EveryHours.description: Called every in game hour on the hour.

Modding:Lua Event/OnCharacterMeet.name: OnCharacterMeet
Modding:Lua Event/OnCharacterMeet.description: Triggered when a survivor meets another character.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: The number of times before this the two characters have met; if it is 0, this is the first time.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: denoted key. (See Keyboard Class in java docs for more info.)

Modding:Lua Event/OnWeaponHitTree.name: OnWeaponHitTree
Modding:Lua Event/OnWeaponHitTree.description: Triggered when an [[IsoGameCharacter]] uses a [[HandWeapon]] to hit an [[IsoTree]].

Modding:Lua Event/OnPreUIDraw.name: OnPreUIDraw
Modding:Lua Event/OnPreUIDraw.description: Called by UI Manager in its render function before the UI gets drawn.

Modding:Lua Event/OnLoadMapZones.name: OnLoadMapZones
Modding:Lua Event/OnLoadMapZones.description: Called when IsoWorld initialises and is registering the zones for the map.

Modding:Lua Event/OnSpawnRegionsLoaded.name: OnSpawnRegionsLoaded
Modding:Lua Event/OnSpawnRegionsLoaded.description: Triggered after spawn regions are loaded.
Modding:Lua Event/OnSpawnRegionsLoaded.additional_info: This event is triggered on the server.

Modding:Lua Event/EveryDays.name: EveryDays
Modding:Lua Event/EveryDays.description: Called every in game day at midnight.

Modding:Lua Event/OnFETick.name: OnFETick
Modding:Lua Event/OnFETick.description: Same as OnTick, except is only called while on the main menu.

Modding:Lua Event/OnGameBoot.name: OnGameBoot
Modding:Lua Event/OnGameBoot.description: Lua event is called when the game/server is started or when mods are reloaded while the game is started.

Modding:Lua Event/OnMouseUp.name: OnMouseUp
Modding:Lua Event/OnMouseUp.description: Triggered when mouse button is released.

Modding:Lua Event/OnAIStateChange.name: OnAIStateChange
Modding:Lua Event/OnAIStateChange.description: Triggered before an AI state changes.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character that owns the state machine.

Modding:Lua Event/OnPlayerCancelTimedAct.name: OnPlayerCancelTimedAction
Modding:Lua Event/OnPlayerCancelTimedAct.description: Triggered when a player cancels a timed action.

Modding:Lua Event/OnMouseDown.name: OnMouseDown
Modding:Lua Event/OnMouseDown.description: Triggered when mouse button is down.

Modding:Lua Event/OnWeaponHitCharacter.name: OnWeaponHitCharacter
Modding:Lua Event/OnWeaponHitCharacter.description: Triggered when a [[IsoGameCharacter]] has been hit by a [[HandWeapon]]

Modding:Lua Event/OnConnected.name: OnConnected
Modding:Lua Event/OnConnected.description: Called when player successfully connects to server.

Modding:Lua Event/OnSave.name: OnSave
Modding:Lua Event/OnSave.description: Triggered during the game's saving process.
Modding:Lua Event/OnSave.additional_info: The event is triggered after saving ''map_ver.bin'' and ''map_sand.bin'', and just before saving ''map.bin''.

Modding:Lua Event/OnPreFillWorldObjectCo.name: OnPreFillWorldObjectContextMenu
Modding:Lua Event/OnPreFillWorldObjectCo.description: Called before context menu for world objects is filled.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player who will see the menu.

parameters.name: boolean
parameters.description: True if called for the purpose of testing for nearby objects.

Modding:Lua Event/OnPlayerSetSafehouse.name: OnPlayerSetSafehouse
Modding:Lua Event/OnPlayerSetSafehouse.description: Triggered when survivor group has their safehouse set.

parameters.name: survivorGroup
parameters.description: The survivor group safehouse is being set for.

parameters.name: buildingDef
parameters.description: The building definition of the safehouse being set.

Modding:Lua Event/OnObjectRightMouseButt.name: OnObjectRightMouseButtonUp
Modding:Lua Event/OnObjectRightMouseButt.description: Triggered when right mouse button is released on [[IsoObject]]

Modding:Lua Event/OnFillInventoryObjectC.name: OnFillInventoryObjectContextMenu
Modding:Lua Event/OnFillInventoryObjectC.description: Use the event (as you would 'OnTick' etc) to add items to context menu without mod conflicts.

Modding:Lua Event/OnRenderUpdate.name: OnRenderUpdate
Modding:Lua Event/OnRenderUpdate.description: Used to be called every Display.update() but is now obsolete.

Modding:Lua Event/OnKeyKeepPressed.name: OnKeyKeepPressed
Modding:Lua Event/OnKeyKeepPressed.description: Called when key is held down.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: denoted key. (See Keyboard Class in java docs for more info.)

Modding:Lua Event/OnConnectionStateChang.name: OnConnectionStateChanged
Modding:Lua Event/OnConnectionStateChang.description: Called at the different stages that a players connection state changes to the server when initially connecting.

Modding:Lua Event/OnEquipPrimary.name: OnEquipPrimary
Modding:Lua Event/OnEquipPrimary.description: Triggered when a character equips an item in its primary slot.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character which equipped the item.

Modding:Lua Event/EveryTenMinutes.name: EveryTenMinutes
Modding:Lua Event/EveryTenMinutes.description: Called every ten in game minutes.

Modding:Lua Event/OnJoypadActivate.name: OnJoypadActivate
Modding:Lua Event/OnJoypadActivate.description: Triggered when a controller is activated.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: The ID of the activated controller.

Modding:Lua Event/OnAIStateEnter.name: OnAIStateEnter
Modding:Lua Event/OnAIStateEnter.description: Triggered when an AI state is entered.

parameters.name: character
parameters.description: The character the state will execute on.

Modding:Lua Event/OnKeyStartPressed.name: OnKeyStartPressed
Modding:Lua Event/OnKeyStartPressed.description: Called when key is initially pressed.

parameters.name: integer
parameters.description: denoted key. (See Keyboard Class in java docs for more info.)
